description: Manage files with fast reading, searching, listing, and line counting. Retrieve detailed file information and filter results with glob patterns. Stay safe with path traversal protection, file size limits, and binary detection.

configSchema.title: ConfigSchema

base_path.description: Base directory path for file operations (defaults to current directory)

max_file_size.description: Maximum file size in bytes to read (default: 1MB)

configSchema.description: Configuration schema for the file operations server.

capabilities.name: read_file
capabilities.description:
Read and return the contents of a text file.
        
        Args:
            file_path: Path to the file to read (relative to base_path)
            ctx: Context containing session configuration
            
        Returns:
            The contents of the file as a string

capabilities.name: list_directory
capabilities.description:
List files and directories in a specified path.
        
        Args:
            directory_path: Path to the directory to list (relative to base_path)
            pattern: Glob pattern to filter results (default: "*" for all files)
            ctx: Context containing session configuration
            
        Returns:
            A formatted string listing files and directories

capabilities.name: search_in_files
capabilities.description:
Search for a term in files matching a pattern.
        
        Args:
            search_term: The text to search for
            directory_path: Directory to search in (relative to base_path)
            file_pattern: Glob pattern for files to search (default: "*.txt")
            ctx: Context containing session configuration
            
        Returns:
            A formatted string with search results

capabilities.name: get_file_info
capabilities.description:
Get detailed information about a file.
        
        Args:
            file_path: Path to the file (relative to base_path)
            ctx: Context containing session configuration
            
        Returns:
            A formatted string with file information

capabilities.name: count_lines
capabilities.description:
Count the number of lines in a text file.
        
        Args:
            file_path: Path to the file (relative to base_path)
            ctx: Context containing session configuration
            
        Returns:
            The number of lines in the file
